features.situation: in penalties may be ignored when due to close quarters

fdfa9023-fd02-4a3b-81a0-974b53c2b1b1.name: Easy to Hit
fdfa9023-fd02-4a3b-81a0-974b53c2b1b1.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

d1b8965f-b0ba-4dc1-8e17-9fa162a6d9bc.name: Honesty
d1b8965f-b0ba-4dc1-8e17-9fa162a6d9bc.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

6d9ebbcd-fa04-4c91-8985-a7b7e32949d4.name: Selfless
6d9ebbcd-fa04-4c91-8985-a7b7e32949d4.notes: You must make a self-control roll to put your needs – even survival – before those of someone else.
